com.premiumminds.billy.core.persistence.dao

Interface DAO<T extends BaseEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The entity type being managed by the DAO implementation
    All Superinterfaces:
    EntityFactory<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DAOAddress, DAOApplication, DAOBankAccount, DAOBusiness, DAOContact, DAOContext, DAOCustomer, DAOGenericInvoice, DAOGenericInvoiceEntry, DAOProduct, DAOShippingPoint, DAOSupplier, DAOTax
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDAO, DAOAddressImpl, DAOApplicationImpl, DAOBankAccountImpl, DAOBusinessImpl, DAOContactImpl, DAOContextImpl, DAOCustomerImpl, DAOGenericInvoiceEntryImpl, DAOGenericInvoiceImpl, DAOProductImpl, DAOShippingPointImpl, DAOSupplierImpl, DAOTaxImpl

    public interface DAO<T extends BaseEntity>
extends EntityFactory<T>
    Author:
    Francisco Vargas

        getEntityInstance

    • Method Detail

      • beginTransaction

        void beginTransaction()
        Initialized a transaction context

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        Rolls back the active transaction context, discarding all transaction changes.

      • setForRollback

        void setForRollback()
        Sets the active transaction for rollback. Meaning that the transaction will remain active but all changes will be discarded.

      • isSetForRollback

        boolean isSetForRollback()
        Tells whether a transaction is set for rollback or not
        Returns:
        true if the active transaction if set to rollback. Returns false otherwise.

      • commit

        void commit()
        Commits the active transaction

      • isTransactionActive

        boolean isTransactionActive()
        Tells whether a transaction is currently active or not
        Returns:
        true if a transaction is currently active. Returns false otherwise.

      • get

        T get(UID uid)
        Gets a persisted instance of type T
        Parameters:
        uid - The UID identifying the wanted instance
        Returns:
        The requested instance of type T

      • create

        T create(T entity)
        Persists a new instance of type T
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be persisted
        Returns:
        The entity instance after it's been persisted

      • update

        T update(T entity)
        Persists an updated version of type T
        Parameters:
        entity - The updated entity instance
        Returns:
        The entity instance after it's been updated

      • exists

        boolean exists(UID uid)
        Tells whether an instance of type T is persisted.
        Parameters:
        uid - The unique identifier of the requested instance.
        Returns:
        true if the instance is persisted. Returns false otherwise.
